title: Chain Gun
summaries: The Chain Gun is a Hardmode, post-Plantera gun which fires bullets in random directions over a wide spread, similar to the Gatligator. Its use time of 4 makes it the fastest weapon in Terraria, and it has a 50% chance not to consume ammunition. The Chain Gun is dropped by Santa-NK1 during the Frost Moon event with a 5.55%–12.5% / 12.5%–50% chance depending on the current wave.
Its best modifier is Rapid. However, Godly may be preferred to save ammo. Due to its low use time, it can only gain modifiers that give a speed boost of 15%, thus cannot have the Unreal modifier.

statistics.Sell: 9 GC
